creator: bimargulies@gmail.com
text:
Created attachment 24791
case1 result

Case #1 is what happens when I specify "Candara, MS PMincho" as the font.  I get the Roman letters from Candara and question marks for the Japanese glyphs.
 
Case #2 is what happens when I specify just "MS PMincho" as the font.
 
And FOP blows out when I specify "MS PGothic" as the font.
 
The attached archive should be everything needed to build these test cases in FOP (or to render into HTML for display in a web browser).

creator: bimargulies@gmail.com
text:
Created attachment 24793
everything you need to run this and generate the results

text:
Created attachment 24800
FO file showing test results re font-selection-strategy

This file tests the implementation of font-selection-strategy in a number of cases. Most results are compliant with font-selection-strategy="character-by-character" but there are two exceptions.
